name: The Glitching Graduation
description:
What was supposed to be the greatest day of their lives turns into a living nightmare for four young adults who keep repeating their graduation and must figure out why. 

Credits:

  • Oluwatoyin Ariyo - designer
  • Andrew McKissock- writer
  • George Larkwright - writer
  • Eliana - sound designer/music artist
  • Amanda Parker- character artist
  • Auditorium background art - frances

This is a late entry for AdvXJam . The ending of the game is very rushed because I was trying to meet the deadline (prose exposition is used instead of character dialogue) and as a result, there is only one ending to the game. I will update and refine the game in the next few days.
